quest.name: Tale of Roe
journal:
Zukin has an eye for eggs.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Lure out tatsunoko with live ruby shrimp near Sakazuki and slay them for their roe.
Deliver the tatsunoko roe to the cook at the Ruby Price.
Deliver the fine Hingan wine to Zukin.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: Ah, Forename, the very womanman I was seeking. There is a task I would have you perform in the name of trade relations.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: Take these live ruby shrimp and release them along the shore of Sakazuki. This will lure out tatsunoko, whose roe you may then harvest.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: Once you have the roe, pray deliver it to the cook at the Ruby Price. He will know what to do with it. My thanks in advance, Forename.

dialogue.name: COOK02998
dialogue.text: Looking for the cook? You've found him. What is it you require?

dialogue.name: COOK02998
dialogue.text: Oho, if this isn't tatsunoko roe, and some of the freshest I've seen! Compliments of Zukin, you say? Well, how thoughtful of him!

dialogue.name: COOK02998
dialogue.text: In case you didn't know, tatsunoko roe is a rare delicacy. I'll be able to prepare such a treat for our troops as they seldom enjoy! Now, such kindness shouldn't go unacknowledged...

dialogue.name: COOK02998
dialogue.text: One of the finest wines I have in my stores. Please give it to Zukin along with my regards. And with that, I take my leave─I have a feast to prepare!

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: ...Our gift was so well received that we received one in return? Wonderful!

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: <sniff> Ah, this is truly a fine rice wine. We've not the means to brew our own, so it is doubly appreciated. My thanks for handling the task, Forename.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: Ever since we began trading with Kokajiya, travel to Kugane has become a regularity. This in turn led to more opportunities for contact with the Ruby Price.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: For now, the fortification serves simply as a convenient waypoint, but ere long it will become a destination in its own right. Our efforts to establish new trade channels continue to flourish, and we owe no small part of our success to you.
